short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write code samples without any chance for mistakes! Enter a text, click on activate and start typing inside a <textarea>

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlindJS is an extremely useful tool for lectures, lessons and presentations.
It allows you to write code samples quickly and without any chance for mistakes. Enter a text, click on activate and start typing inside a <textarea>. Click on terminate to go back to regular typing.
